---
category: news
title: "Allity trials prototype robot"
excerpt: "Aged care provider Allity is trialling a companion robot at one of its facilities in Melbourne. Developed by Australian-based artificial intelligence start-up Andromeda Robotics, the robot – which is being trialled at Allity Montclaire in Brighton – has been designed to interact with residents in a relaxed and informal manner."
